apiDocs.title: MMCore API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Complete reference for integrating with our multi-carrier shipping platform
apiDocs.includeAuthUser: Include your AUTH_USER and AUTH_PW to authenticate.
apiDocs.statusCodesIntro: Status codes returned in tracking responses with their descriptions

auth.description: Authenticate and validate your API credentials

tracking.description: Get detailed tracking information for shipments with comprehensive query parameters

query.lang: Sets the language for the API response
query.flightTrackingSetting: Defines how flight/waybill tracking should be handled
query.type: Specifies the type of tracking being used
query.trackingDetails: Defines the level of detail in the tracking response

action.description: Request a carrier label for a specific country with various output options

query.pl: Y = Show PDF label, N = get JSON result
query.dhlzpl: Y = get DHL JSON Label, N = get URL to get PDF
query.zpl: Y = get ZPL label if carrier supports it
query.o: Output will be in JSON format
query.dl: Y = the label will be called within this call

postManifest.description: Upload manifest data to the database for shipment processing (supports bulk uploads)

query.ls: Y = Lock manifest data (if there are no errors), N = Don't lock manifest data. ONLY APPLICABLE FOR AIRWAYBILLS

lockShipment.description: Lock a shipment to prevent further changes (Airwaybills only). This notifies that the shipment is complete.

statusCodeDescriptions.2001: Information has been sent, waiting for the logistics provider to pick up the cargo
statusCodeDescriptions.2002: The logistics provider gets the cargo
statusCodeDescriptions.2004: The cargo arrived at their destination
statusCodeDescriptions.2005: Notify the consignee to pick up the cargo
statusCodeDescriptions.2006: The cargo is delivered to the consignee
statusCodeDescriptions.2007: Packages were lost, damaged, returned, unclaimed, etc
statusCodeDescriptions.3005: Parcel has arrived at the last-mile carrier
statusCodeDescriptions.5001: Parcel is out for delivery to recipient
statusCodeDescriptions.5002: A text message notification has been sent to the recipient
statusCodeDescriptions.5003: Parcel is out for delivery to parcel locker
statusCodeDescriptions.5004: Parcel is out for delivery to parcel shop
statusCodeDescriptions.7000: Recipient was not at home, second try:
statusCodeDescriptions.7001: Recipient was not at home, package will be stored on the depot for 5 days
statusCodeDescriptions.7003: Recipient was not at home, package can be picked up at a collection point
statusCodeDescriptions.9001: Package is delivered to the neighbors
statusCodeDescriptions.9002: Package is delivered to the parcelshop
statusCodeDescriptions.9003: Package is delivered to the parcelbox
statusCodeDescriptions.9004: Package is delivered to a secure place
statusCodeDescriptions.9503: Package is rerouted to a new address
